import React, {useState,setState,Component} from 'react'; import {NavLink,Link} from "react-router-dom"; import '../Css/styles.css'; import Switch from "react-switch"; import DataService from '../../service/DataService'; import MyntInvestLogo from '../../assets/images/MyntInvest.png'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import UploadService from "../../service/file-upload.service"; import Moment from 'moment'; import $ from "jquery"; const formatDate = Moment("12/09/2002").format('YYYY-MM-DD')//2002-12-09 const extractFilename = (path) => { const pathArray = path.split("/"); const lastIndex = pathArray.length - 1; return pathArray[lastIndex]; }; class Investors_Terms extends Component { constructor() { super(); this.state = { checked: false }; this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this); } handleChange(checked) { this.setState({ checked }); } render() { return(
 

Become An Investors

To invest through Tyke, you must understand the basics of Startup Investing, Please acknowledge that you are aware of the following:

01 Risk

To invest through Tyke, you must understand the basics of Startup Investing, Please acknowledge that you are aware of the following:

02 Limited Transfer

Investment in startups in highly illud such companies are unite/private and cannot be sold easily on an exchange or simillar Secondry Trading

I understand that I can lose the money i'm investing

03 Diversification

Investment in startups in highly illud such companies are unite/private and cannot be sold easily on an exchange or simillar Secondry Trading

I understand that it's safer to split money across many investments across asset classes

04 Cancellation

I understand that i can't cancel after the 48-hour cencellation deadline

I understand that i can lose the money i'm investing

05 Research

Do your own research. Read the documents provided by each company. Get independent legal accounting and financial advice. if you have any
questions or need more information, reach out to us via support

I understand that doing research is my own responsibillity
